GE07bhg4c10u:1: śrī-bhagavān uvāca bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:6: evaṃ tāvat saptamādibhir adhyāyair bhajanīyaṃ parameśvara-tattvaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:8: tad-vibhūtayaś ca saptame raso 'ham apsu kaunteya [Gītā 7.8]
GE07bhg4c10u:12: navame ca ahaṃ kratur ahaṃ yajña [Gītā 9.16] ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c10u:13: idānīṃ tā eva vibhūtīḥ prapañcayiṣyan sva-bhakteś cāvaśya-karaṇīyatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:16: yuddhādi-svadharmānuṣṭhāne mahat-paricaryāyāṃ vā kuśalau bāhū yasya tathā he mahābāho ! bhūya eva punar api me vacaḥ śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c10u:21: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ saptamāṣṭama-navamais tat-padārthasya bhagavatas tattvaṃ sopādhikaṃ nirupādhikaṃ ca darśitam |
GE07bhg4c10u:22: tasya ca vibhūtayaḥ sopādhikasya dhyāne nirupādhikasya jñāne copāya-bhūtā raso 'ham apsu kaunteya [Gītā 7.8] ity ādinā saptame, ahaṃ kratur ahaṃ yajña [Gītā 9.16]
GE07bhg4c10u:24: athedānīṃ tāsāṃ vistaro vaktavyo bhagavato dhyānāya tattvam api durvijṇiyatvāt punas tasya vaktavyaṃ jñānāyeti daśamo 'dhyāya ārabhyate |
GE07bhg4c10u:25: tatra prathamam arjunaṃ protsāhayitum bhūya eveti |
GE07bhg4c10u:26: bhūya eva punar api he mahābāho śṛṇu me mama paramaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ vacaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:27: yat te tubhyaṃ prīyamāṇāya mad-vacanād amṛta-pānād iva prītam anubhavate vakṣyāmy ahaṃ paramāptas
GE07bhg4c10u:32: ārādhyatva-jñāna-kāraṇam aiśvaryaṃ yad eva pūrvatra saptamādiṣūktam |
GE07bhg4c10u:33: tad eva sa-viśeṣaṃ bhakti-matām ānandārthaṃ prapañcayiṣyan parokṣa-vādā ṛṣayaḥ parokṣaṃ ca mama priyam [BhP 11.21.35] iti nyāyena kiñcid
GE07bhg4c10u:35: punar api rāja-vidyā-rāja-guhyam idam ucyate ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:36: he mahābāho ! iti yathā bāhu-balaḥ sarvādhikyena tvayā prakāśitaṃ, tathaivaitad buddhyā buddhi-balam api savārdhikyena prakāśayitavyam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:37: śṛṇv iti śṛṇvantam api taṃ vakṣyamāṇe 'rthe
GE07bhg4c10u:40: te tvām ativismitīkartuṃ kriyārthopapadasya ca [Pāṇ 2.3.14] iti caturthī |
GE07bhg4c10u:47: idānīṃ tasyā utpattaye vivṛddhaye ca svāsādharaṇīḥ prāk saṃkṣipyoktāḥ sva-vibhūti-vistareṇa varṇayiṣyan bhagavān uvāca bhūya iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:48: he mahābāho ! bhūya eva punar api me paramaṃ vacaḥ śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c10u:49: śṛṇvantaṃ prati śṛṇv ity uktir upadeśye 'rthe samavadhānāya |
GE07bhg4c10u:50: paramaṃ śrīmat mad-divya-vibhūti-viṣayakaṃ yad vacas te tubhyam ahaṃ hita-kāmyayā
GE07bhg4c10u:53: vijñam api tvāṃ vismitaṃ kartum ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:56: te kīdṛśāyety āha prīyamāṇāyeti pīyūṣa-pānād iva mad-vākyāt prītiṃ vindate ||1||
GE07bhg4c10u:58: na me viduḥ sura-gaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:59: aham ādir hi devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c10u:60: śrīdharaḥ : uktasyāpi punar vacane durjñeyatvaṃ hetum āha na me vidur iti
GE07bhg4c10u:61: | me mama prakṛṣṭaṃ bhavaṃ janma-rahitasyāpi nānā-vibhūtibhir āvirbhāvaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:62: sura-gaṇā api maharṣayo 'pi bhṛgv-ādayo na jānanti |
GE07bhg4c10u:63: tatra hetuḥ -- ahaṃ hi sarva-devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ cādiḥ kāraṇam |
GE07bhg4c10u:64: sarvaśaḥ sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ utpādakatvena buddhy-ādi-pravartakatvena ca |
GE07bhg4c10u:65: ato mad-anugrahaṃ vinā māṃ ke 'pi na jānantīty arthaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c10u:66: madhusūdanaḥ : prāg-bahudhoktam eva kim arthaṃ punar vakṣyasīty ata āha na me vidur iti
GE07bhg4c10u:67: prabhavaṃ prabhāvaṃ prabhu-śakty-atiśayaṃ prabhavanam utpattim aneka-vibhūtibhir āvirbhāvaṃ vā sura-gaṇā indrādayo maharṣayaś ca
GE07bhg4c10u:68: bhṛgv-ādayaḥ sarvajñā api na me viduḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:69: teṣāṃ tad-ajñāne hetum āha ahaṃ hi yasmāt sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ sarvaiḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:72: ato mad-vikārās te mat-prabhāvaṃ na jānantīty arthaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c10u:73: viśvanāthaḥ : etac ca kevalaṃ mad-anugrahātiśayenaiva vedyaṃ nānyathety āha na me iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:74: mama prabhavaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ bhavaṃ devakyāṃ janma deva-gaṇā na jānanti, te viṣayāviṣṭatvān na jānantu |
GE07bhg4c10u:75: ṛṣayas tu jānīyus tatrāha na maharṣayo 'pi |
GE07bhg4c10u:76: tatra hetuḥ aham ādiḥ kāraṇaṃ sarvaśaḥ sarvair eva prakāraiḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:77: na hi pitur janma-tattvaṃ putrā jānantīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:78: na hi te bhagavan vyaktiṃ vidur devā na dānavā [Gītā 10.14] ity agrimānuvādād atra prabhava-śabdasyānyārthatā na kalpyā ||2||
GE07bhg4c10u:79: baladevaḥ : etac ca mad-bhaktānukampāṃ vinā durvijñānam iti bhāvavān āha na me iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:80: sura-gaṇā brahmādayo maharṣayaś ca sanakādayaḥ me prabhavaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:81: prabhutvena bhavam anādi-divya-svarūpa-guṇa-vibhūti-mattayāvartanam iti yāvat na vidur na jānanti |
GE07bhg4c10u:82: kuta ity āha aham ādir iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:83: yad ahaṃ teṣām ādiḥ pūrva-kāraṇaṃ sarvaśaḥ sarvaiḥ prakārair utpādakatayā
GE07bhg4c10u:85: devatvādikam aiśvaryādikaṃ ca mayaiva tebhyas tat-tad-ārādhana-tuṣṭena datta-mataḥ sva-pūrva-siddhaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:88: ko addhā veda ka iha prāvocat kuta ā jātā kuta iyaṃ visṛṣṭiḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:89: arvāg-devā asya visarjanāya athā ko veda yata ābabhūva [Rv 8.7.17, Taitt.Br. 2.8.9.76]
GE07bhg4c10u:90: naitad devā āpnuvan pūrvam arśat iti caivam ādyā ||2||
GE07bhg4c10u:92: yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti lokamaheśvaram asaṃmūḍhaḥ sa martyeṣu sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ||3||
GE07bhg4c10u:93: śrīdharaḥ : evambhūtātma-jñāne phalam āha yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:95: eva na vidyata ādiḥ kāraṇaṃ yasya tam anādim |
GE07bhg4c10u:97: lokānāṃ maheśvaraṃ ca māṃ yo vetti sa manuṣyeṣv asaṃmūḍhaḥ saṃmoha-rahitaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:99: madhusūdanaḥ : mahāphalatvāc ca kaścid eva bhagavataḥ prabhāvaṃ vettīty āha yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:100: sarva-kāraṇatvān na vidyata ādiḥ kāraṇaṃ yasya tam anādim anāditvād ajaṃ janma-śūnyaṃ lokānāṃ mahāntam īśvaraṃ ca māṃ yo vetti sa martyeṣu madhye 'saṃmūḍhaḥ saṃmoha-varjitaḥ sarvaiḥ pāpair mati-pūrva-kṛtair api pramucyate prakarṣeṇa kāraṇocchedāt
GE07bhg4c10u:102: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu para-brahmaṇaḥ sarva-deśa-kālāparicchinnasya tavaitad dehasyaiva janma devā ṛṣayaś ca jānanty eva |
GE07bhg4c10u:106: kiṃ parameṣṭhinaṃ na anādiṃ satyaṃ tarhi anāditvād ajam ajanyaṃ parmātmānaṃ tvāṃ vetty eva tatrāha ceti |
GE07bhg4c10u:107: ajam ajanyaṃ vasudeva-janyaṃ ca mām anādim eva yo vetti ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:108: mām iti padena vasudeva-janyatvaṃ budhyate janma karma ca me divyam [Gītā 4.9] iti mad-ukteḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:109: mama janmavattvaṃ paramātmatvāt sadaivājatvaṃ ca ity ubhayam api me paramaṃ satyaṃ acintya-śakti-siddham
GE07bhg4c10u:111: yad uktaṃ ajo 'pi sann avyayātmāà sambhavāmi [Gītā 4.6] iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:113: coddhava-vākyaṃ karmāṇy anīhasya bhavo 'bhavasya te ity ādy-anantaraṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:117: tat tan na vāstavaṃ cet syād vidāṃ buddhi-bhramas tadā |
GE07bhg4c10u:118: na syād evety ato 'cintyā śaktir līlāsu kāraṇam || [LBhāg 1.5.119]
GE07bhg4c10u:119: tasmād yathā mama bālye dāmodaratva-līlāyām ekadaiva kiṅkiṇyā bandhanāt
GE07bhg4c10u:120: paricchinnatvaṃ dāmnā svābandhād aparicchinnatvaṃ cātarkyam eva tathaiva
GE07bhg4c10u:123: loka-maheśvaraṃ tava sārathim api sarveṣāṃ lokānāṃ mahāntam īśvaraṃ yo veda sa eva martyeṣu madhye asaṃmūḍhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:125: yas tu ajatvānāditva-sarveśvaratvāny eva vāstavāni syur janmavattvādīni tu anukaraṇa-mātra-siddhānīti vyācaṣṭe |
GE07bhg4c10u:126: sa saṃmūḍha eva sarva-pāpair na pramucyata ity arthaḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c10u:127: baladevaḥ : idaṃ tādṛśa-mad-viṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ kasyacid eva bhavatīti bhāvenāha yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:128: martyeṣu yatamāneṣv api sahasreṣu madhye yo
GE07bhg4c10u:129: yādṛcchika-mattatvavit sat-prasaṅgī kaścij jano mām anādim ajaṃ loka-maheśvaraṃ ca vetti
GE07bhg4c10u:131: atra ajam ity anena pradhānād acid-vargāt saṃsāri-vargāc ca bhedaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:133: anādim ity anena viśesite tu mukta-cid-vargāc ca bhedas tasyājatvam
GE07bhg4c10u:135: ity anena nitya-mukta-cid-vargāt prakṛti-kālābhyāṃ ca bhedas teṣām
GE07bhg4c10u:137: punar anādima ity anena viśeṣite vidhi-rudrādibhyāṃ ca bhedas tayor loka-maheśvaratāyāḥ sāditvāt sarvaiśvareṇaiva tayoḥ sety anyatra vistaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:140: vetti, sa mad-bhakty-utpatti-pratīpair nikhilaiḥ karmabhir vimukto
GE07bhg4c10u:143: na ca devakyāṃ jātasya te katham ajatvaṃ tasyām ajatvam avihāyaiva jātatvāt ||3||
GE07bhg4c10u:145: buddhir jñānam asaṃmohaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavo 'bhāvo bhayaṃ cābhayam eva ca ||4||
GE07bhg4c10u:146: ahiṃsā samatā tuṣṭis tapo dānaṃ yaśo 'yaśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:147: bhavanti bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthagvidhāḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c10u:148: śrīdharaḥ : loka-maheśvaratām eva sphuṭayati buddhir iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:165: asya ślokasya matta eva bhavatīty uttareṇānvayaḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c10u:174: ete buddhir jñānam ity ādayas tad-viparītāś cābuddhy-ādayo nānā-vidhā
GE07bhg4c10u:175: bhāvāḥ prāṇināṃ matto mat-sakāśād eva bhavanti ||5||
GE07bhg4c10u:176: madhusūdanaḥ : ātmano loka-maheśvaratvaṃ prapañcayati buddhir iti dvābhyām
GE07bhg4c10u:180: asaṃmohaḥ pratyutpanneṣu bodhavyeṣu kartavyeṣu vyākulatayā vivekena pravṛttiḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:211: pṛthag-vidhā dharmādharmādi-sādhana-vaicitryeṇa nānā-vidhā bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ mattaḥ parameśvarād eva bhavanti nānyasmāt tasmāt kiṃ vācyaṃ mama loka-maheśvaratvam ity arthaḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c10u:212: viśvanāthaḥ : na ca śāstra-jñāḥ sva-buddhy-ādibhir mattatvaṃ jñātuṃ śaknuvanti, yato buddhy-ādīnāṃ sattvādivan-māyā-guṇa-janyatvān matta eva jātānām api guṇātīte mayi nāsti svataḥ praveśayogyatety āha buddhiḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:218: prasaṅgād anyān api bhāvān lokeṣu dṛṣṭān na svata evodbhūtān āha kṣamā sahiṣṇutvam |
GE07bhg4c10u:229: samatātmaupamyena sarvatra sukha-duḥkhādi-darśanam ahiṃsā samate sāttvikyau |
GE07bhg4c10u:235: matta iti ete man-māyāto bhavanto 'pi śakti-śaktimator
GE07bhg4c10u:237: baladevaḥ : athātmanaḥ sarvāditvaṃ sarveśvaratvaṃ ca prapañcayati buddhir
GE07bhg4c10u:262: tad-viparītaṃ ayaśaḥ evam ādayo bhāvā bhūtānāṃ deva-mānavādīnāṃ matto mat-saṅkalpād eva bhavantīty aham eva teṣāṃ hetur ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:265: maharṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāro manavas tathā mānasā jātā yeṣāṃ loka imāḥ prajāḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c10u:267: sapta maharṣayo bhṛgv-ādayaḥ sapta brahmāṇa ity ete purāṇe niścayaṃ gatāḥ [Mbh 12.201.5] ity ādi purāṇa-prasiddhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:268: tebhyo 'pi pūrve anye catvāro maharṣayaḥ sanakādayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:270: mad-bhāvā madīyo bhāvaḥ prabhāvo yeṣu te |
GE07bhg4c10u:273: yeṣāṃ bhṛgv-ādīnāṃ sanakādīnāṃ manūnāṃ cemā brāhmaṇādyā loke vardhamānā yathāyathaṃ putra-pautrādi-rūpāḥ śiṣa-praśiṣyādi-rūpāś ca prajā jātāḥ pravartante ||6||
GE07bhg4c10u:274: madhusūdanaḥ : itaś caitad evam maharṣaya iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:279: bhṛguṃ marīcim atriṃ ca pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum |
GE07bhg4c10u:280: vasiṣṭhaṃ ca mahātejāḥ so 'sṛjan manasā sutān |
GE07bhg4c10u:281: sapta brahmaṇa ity ete purāṇe niścayaṃ gatāḥ || iti |[*ENDNOTE] [Mbh
GE07bhg4c10u:282: tathā catvāro manavaḥ sāvarṇā iti prasiddhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:285: tebhyo 'pi pūrve prathamāś catvāraḥ sanakādyā maharṣayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:286: manavas tathā svāyambhuvādayaś caturdaśa mayi parameśvare bhāvo bhāvanā yeṣāṃ te mad-bhāvā mac-cintana-parā mad-bhāvanāvaśād
GE07bhg4c10u:288: mānasā manasaḥ saṅkalpād evotpannā na tu yonijāḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:290: sarva-prāṇi-śreṣṭhā matta eva hiraṇyagarbhātmano jātāḥ sargādya-kāle
GE07bhg4c10u:292: yeṣāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ saptānāṃ bhṛgv-ādīnāṃ catūrṇāṃ ca sanakādīnāṃ manūnāṃ ca caturdaśānām asmin loke janmanā ca vidyayā ca
GE07bhg4c10u:295: tattvato 'pi tatrāsamarthān āha maharṣayaḥ sapta marīcy-ādayas tebhyo 'pi
GE07bhg4c10u:296: pūrve 'nye catvāraḥ sanakādayo manavaś caturdaśa svāyambhuvādayo matta eva hiraṇyagarbhātmanaḥ sakāśād bhavo janma yeṣāṃ marīcy-ādīnāṃ sanakādīnāṃ cemā brāhmaṇādyā loke vartamānāḥ prajāḥ putra-pautrādi-rūpāḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:298: baladevaḥ : itaś caitad evam ity āha maharṣaya iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:300: tebhyo 'pi pūrve prathamāś catvāraḥ sanakādaya ekādaśaite maharṣayas tathā manavaś caturdaśa svāyambhuvādaya evaṃ pañcaviṃśatir ete mānasā hiraṇyagarbhātmano mama manaḥ-prabhṛtyebhyo jātā mad-bhāvā
GE07bhg4c10u:302: yeṣāṃ bhṛgv-ādīnāṃ pañcaviṃśater imā brāhmaṇa-kṣatriyādayaḥ prajā janmanā vidyayā ca santati-rūpā bhavanti ||6||
GE07bhg4c10u:304: etāṃ vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca mama yo vetti tattvataḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:306: śrīdharaḥ : yathokta-vibhūty-ādi-tattva-jñānasya phalam āha etām iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:309: tattvato yo vetti, so 'vikalpena niḥsaṃśayena yogena samyag-darśanena
GE07bhg4c10u:311: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ sopādhikasya bhagavataḥ prabhāvam uktvā taj-jñāna-phalam āha etām iti
GE07bhg4c10u:316: mama yo vetti tattvato yathāvat so
GE07bhg4c10u:317: 'vikampenāpracalitena yogena samyag-jñāna-sthairya-lakṣaṇena samādhinā yujyate nātra saṃśayaḥ pratibandhaḥ kaścit ||7||
GE07bhg4c10u:318: viśvanāthaḥ : kintu bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ [BhP 11.14.11] iti mad-ukter
GE07bhg4c10u:319: mad-ananya-bhakta eva mat-prasādān mad-vāci dṛḍham āstikyaṃ dadhāno
GE07bhg4c10u:320: mat-tattvaṃ vettīty āha etāṃ saṅkṣepeṇaiva vakṣyamāṇāṃ vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:322: mat-prabhoḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya vākyatvād idam eva paramaṃ tattvam iti dṛḍhatarāstikyavān eva yo vetti saḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:323: avikalpena niścalena yogena mat-tattva-jñāna-lakṣaṇena yujyate yukto bhaved atra nāsti ko 'pi sandehaḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c10u:329: kalyāṇa-guṇa-ratnair mama sambandhaṃ ca yo vetti sarveśvareṇa sarvajñena vāsudevenopadiṣṭam idaṃ tāttvikaṃ bhavatīti dṛḍha-viśvāsena yo gṛhṇāti sa
GE07bhg4c10u:330: avikalpena sthireṇa yogena mad-bhakti-lakṣaṇena yujyate sampanno bhavati |
GE07bhg4c10u:331: etādṛśatayā maj-jñānaṃ mad-bhakter utpādakaṃ vivardhakaṃ ceti bhāvaḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c10u:333: ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate |
GE07bhg4c10u:335: śrīdharaḥ : yathā ca vibhūti-yogayor jñānena samyag-jñānāvāptis tad darśayati aham ity ādi-caturbhiḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:338: matta eva ca sarvasya buddhir jñānam asaṃmoha ity ādi sarvaṃ pravartata iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:339: evaṃ matvāvabudhya budhā vivekino bhāva-samanvitāḥ prīti-yuktā māṃ bhajante ||8||
GE07bhg4c10u:340: madhusūdanaḥ : yādṛśena vibhūti-yogayor jñānenāvikampa-yoga-prāptis tad darśayati aham ity ādi-caturbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:341: ahaṃ paraṃ brahma vāsudevākhyaṃ sarvasya jagataḥ prabhava utpatti-kāraṇam upādānaṃ nimittaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:342: sthiti-nāśādi ca sarvaṃ satta eva pravartate bhavati |
GE07bhg4c10u:343: mayaivāntaryāmiṇā sarvajñena sarva-śaktinā preryamāṇaṃ sva-sva-maryādām anatikramya sarvaṃ jagat pravartate ceṣṭata iti vā |
GE07bhg4c10u:345: vivekenāvagata-tattva-bhāvena paramārtha-tattva-grahaṇaa-rūpeṇa premṇā samanvitāḥ santo māṃ bhajante ||8||
GE07bhg4c10u:346: viśvanāthaḥ : tatra mahaiśvarya-lakṣaṇāṃ vibhūtim āha ahaṃ sarvasya
GE07bhg4c10u:348: matta evāntaryāmi-svarūpāt sarvaṃ jagat pravartate cesṭate |
GE07bhg4c10u:349: tathā matta eva nāradādy-avatarātmakāt sarvaṃ bhakti-jñāna-tapaḥ-karmādikaṃ sādhanaṃ tat tat sādhyaṃ ca pravṛttaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c10u:350: aikāntika-bhakti-lakṣaṇaṃ yogam āha iti matvā āstikyato jñānena niścitya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:353: baladevaḥ : atha catuḥślokyā paramaikāntināṃ bhaktiṃ bruvan tasyā janakaṃ poṣakaṃ cātma-yāthātmyaṃ tāvad āha aham iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:356: evam evātharvasu paṭhyate - yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃś ca gāpayati sma kṛṣṇaḥ [GTU 1.22] iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:358: prajāḥ sṛjaye ity upakramya nārāyaṇād brahmā jāyate nārāyaṇāt prajāpatiḥ prajāyate nārāyaṇād indro jāyate nārāyaṇād aṣṭau vasavo jāyante nārāyaṇād ekādaśa rudrā jāyante nārāyaṇād dvādaśādityāḥ ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c10u:359: eṣa nārāyaṇaḥ kṛṣṇo bodhyaḥ brahmaṇyo devakī-putraḥ ity ādy-uttara-pāṭhāt |
GE07bhg4c10u:361: eko vai nārāyaṇa āsīn na brahmā na īśāno nāpo nāgī samau neme
GE07bhg4c10u:362: dyāv-āpṛthivī na nakṣatrāṇi na sūryaḥ sa ekākī na ramate tasya
GE07bhg4c10u:364: stomam ucyate ity ādy upakramya pradhānādi-sṛṣṭim abhidhāyātha punar eva
GE07bhg4c10u:365: nārāyaṇaḥ so 'nyat kāmo manasā dhyāyata tasya dhyānātaḥsthasya tal-lalāṭāttrakṣyaḥ śūlapāṇiḥ puruṣo 'jāyata bibhrac chriyaṃ satyaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:367: tatra catur-mukho jāyate ity ādi ca |
GE07bhg4c10u:368: ṛkṣu ca yaṃ kāmaye taṃ tam ugraṃ kṛṣṇomi taṃ brahmāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ taṃ sumedhasam ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c10u:370: prajāpatiṃ ca rudraṃ cāpy aham eva sṛjāmi vai |
GE07bhg4c10u:371: tau hi māṃ vijānīto mama māyā-vimohitau || iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:373: nārāyaṇaḥ paro devas tasmāj jātaś caturmukhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:374: tasmād rudro 'bhavad devaḥ sa ca sarvajñatāṃ gataḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:377: sad-guru-mukhān niścitya bhāvena premṇā samanvitāḥ santo budhā māṃ bhajante ||8||
GE07bhg4c10u:380: kathayantaś ca māṃ nityaṃ tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca ||9||
GE07bhg4c10u:381: śrīdharaḥ : prīti-pūrvakaṃ bhajanam āha mac-cittā iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:382: mayy eva cittaṃ yeṣāṃ te mac-cittāḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:383: mām eva gatāḥ prāptāḥ prāṇā indriyāṇi yeṣāṃ te mad-gata-prāṇāḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:385: evaṃbhūtās te budhā anyonyaṃ māṃ nyāyopetaiḥ śruty-ādi-pramāṇair bodhayanto buddhyā ca māṃ kathayantaḥ saṅkīrtayantaḥ santas te nityaṃ tuṣyanty anumodanena tuṣṭiṃ yānti |
GE07bhg4c10u:387: madhusūdanaḥ : prema-pūrvakaṃ bhajanam eva vivṛṇoti mac-cittā iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:388: mayi bhagavati cittaṃ yeṣāṃ te mac-cittāḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:395: parasparam anyonyaṃ śrutibhir yuktibhiś ca mām eva bodhayantas tattva-bubhutsu-kathayā jñāpayantaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:399: tathā jīvanārpaṇam evaṃ samānām anyonyaṃ mad-bodhanaṃ sva-nyūnebhyaś ca
GE07bhg4c10u:400: mad-upadeśanam ity evaṃ rūpaṃ yan mad-bhajanaṃ tenaiva tuṣyanti ca |
GE07bhg4c10u:401: etāvataiva labdha-sarvāthā vayam alam anyena labdhavyenety
GE07bhg4c10u:403: tena santoṣeṇa ramanti ca raante ca priya-saṃgamenevottamaṃ sukham anubhavanti ca |
GE07bhg4c10u:404: tad uktaṃ patañjalinā santoṣād anuttamaḥ sukha-lābhaḥ [Ys 2.42] iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:406: yac ca kāma-sukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham |
GE07bhg4c10u:409: viśvanāthaḥ : etādṛśā ananya-bhaktā eva mat-prasādāl labdha-buddhi-yogaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:410: pūrvokta-lakṣaṇaṃ durbodham api mat-tattva-jñānaṃ prāpnuvantīty āha mac-cittā mad-rūpa-nāma-guṇa-līlā-mādhuryāsvādeṣv eva lubdha-manaso,
GE07bhg4c10u:411: mad-gata-prāṇā māṃ vinā prāṇān dhartum asamarthā anna-gata-prāṇā narā itivat |
GE07bhg4c10u:416: tuṣyanti ca ramanti ceti bhaktyaiva santoṣaś ca ramaṇaṃ ceti rahasyam |
GE07bhg4c10u:418: bhāgya-vaśāt bhajane nirvighne sampadyamāne sati tuṣyanti |
GE07bhg4c10u:420: bhāvi-svīya-sādhya-daśām anusmṛtya ramanti ca manasā sva-prabhuṇā saha ramanti ceti rāgānugā bhaktir dyotitā ||9||
GE07bhg4c10u:421: baladevaḥ : bhaktiḥ prakāram āha mac-cittā iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:423: mad-gata-prāṇā māṃ vinā prāṇān dhartum akṣamā mīnā vināmbhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:428: tathaiva teṣv eva ramante ca yuvati-smita-kaṭākṣāny uktāni |
GE07bhg4c10u:429: tuṣyanti ca ramanti ceti bhaktyaiva santoṣaś ca ramaṇaṃ ceti rahasyam |
GE07bhg4c10u:431: bhāgya-vaśāt bhajane nirvighne sampadyamāne sati tuṣyanti |
GE07bhg4c10u:433: bhāvi-svīya-sādhya-daśām anusmṛtya ramanti ca manasā sva-prabhuṇā saha ramanti ceti rāgānugā bhaktir dyotitā ||9||
GE07bhg4c10u:436: dadāmi buddhi-yogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te ||10||
GE07bhg4c10u:437: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃbhūtānāṃ ca samyag-jñānam ahaṃ dadāmīty āha teṣām iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:438: evaṃ satata-yuktānāṃ mayy āsakta-cittānāṃ prīti-pūrvakaṃ bhajatāṃ teṣāṃ taṃ buddhi-rūpaṃ yogam upāyaṃ dadāmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:439: tam iti kam ? yenopāyena te mad-bhaktā māṃ prāpnuvanti ||10||
GE07bhg4c10u:440: madhusūdanaḥ : ye yathoktena prakāreṇa bhajante māṃ teṣām iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:443: anabhisandhāya prīti-pūrvakam eva bhajatāṃ sevamānānāṃ teṣām avikampena yogeneti yaḥ prāg uktas taṃ buddhi-yogaṃ mattatva-viṣayaṃ samyag-darśanaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:445: yena buddhi-yogena mām īśvaram ātmatvenopayānti ye
GE07bhg4c10u:447: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca iti tvad-uktyā tvad-bhaktānāṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:448: bhaktyaiva paramānando guṇātīta ity avagataṃ, kintu teṣāṃ tvat-sākṣāt-prāptau kaḥ prakāraḥ ? sa ca kutaḥ sakāśāt tair avagantavya
GE07bhg4c10u:450: satata-yuktānāṃ nityam eva mat-saṃyogākāṅkṣaṇāṃ taṃ buddhi-yogaṃ dadāmi teṣāṃ hṛd-vṛttiṣv aham eva udbhāvayāmīti |
GE07bhg4c10u:451: sa buddhi-yogaḥ svato 'nyasmāc ca kutaścid apy adhigantum aśakyaḥ kintu mad-eka-deyas tad-eka-grāhya iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:452: mām upayānti mām upalabhante sākṣān man-nikaṭaṃ prāpnuvanti ||10||
GE07bhg4c10u:453: baladevaḥ : nanu svarūpeṇa guṇair vibhūtibhiś cānantaṃ tvāṃ kathaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:454: gurūpadeśa-mātreṇa te grahītuṃ kṣamerann iti cet tatrāha teṣām iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:455: satata-yuktānāṃ nityaṃ mad-yogaṃ vāñchatāṃ prīti-pūrvakaṃ mama
GE07bhg4c10u:459: tathāham udbhāvayāmi yathānanta-guṇa-vibhūtiṃ mām gṛhītvopāsya ca
GE07bhg4c10u:464: śrīdharaḥ : buddhi-yogaṃ dattvā ca tasyānubhava-paryantaṃ tam
GE07bhg4c10u:465: āviṣkṛtyāvidyā-kṛtaṃ saṃsāraṃ nāśayāmīty āha teṣām iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:466: teṣām anukampārtham anugrahārtham evājñānāj jātaṃ tamaḥ saṃsārākhyaṃ nāśayāmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:467: kutra sthitaḥ san kena vā sādhanena tamo nāśayasi ? ata āha ātma-bhāva-stho buddhi-vṛttau sthitaḥ san |
GE07bhg4c10u:471: teṣām eva kathaṃ śreyaḥ syād ity anugrahārtham ātma-bhāvasya ātmākārāntaḥ-karaṇa-vṛttau viṣayatvena sthito 'haṃ sva-prakāśa-caitanyānandādvaya-lakṣaṇa ātmā tenaiva mad-viṣayāntaḥkaraṇa-pariṇāma-rūpeṇa jñāna-dīpena dīpa-sadṛśena jñānena bhāsvatā cid-ābhāsa-yuktenāpratibaddhena ajñāna-jam ajñānopādānakaṃ tamo mithyā-pratyaya-lakṣaṇaṃ sva-viṣayāvaraṇam andhakāraṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:474: yathā dīpenāndhakāre nivartanīye dīpotpattim antareṇa na karmaṇo
GE07bhg4c10u:475: 'bhyāsasya vāpekṣā vidyamānasyaivaa ca vastuno 'bhivyaktis tato nānutpannasya kasyacid utpattis tathā jñānenājñāne nivartanīye na jñānotpattim antareṇānyasya karmaṇo 'bhyāsasya vāpekṣā vidyamānasyaiva ca
GE07bhg4c10u:476: brahma-bhāvasya mokṣasyābhivyaktis tato nānutpannasyotpattir yena kṣayitvaṃ karmādi-sāpekṣatvaṃ vā bhaved iti rūpakālaṅkāreṇa sūcito 'rthaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:477: | bhāsvatety anena tīvra-pavanāder ivāsaṃbhāvanādeḥ pratibandhakasyābhāvaḥ sūcitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:481: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu ca vidyādi-vṛttiṃ vinā kathaṃ tvad-adhigamaḥ ? tasmāt tair api tad-arthaṃ yatanīyam eva ? tatra nahi nahīty āha teṣām eva na tv anyeṣāṃ yoginām anukapārthaṃ mad-anukampā yena prakāreṇa syāt tad-artham
GE07bhg4c10u:483: tair mad-anukampā-prāptau kāpi cintā na kāryā yatas teṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:484: mad-anukampā-prāpty-artham aham eva yatamāno varta eveti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:487: na sāttvikaṃ nirguṇatve 'pi bhakty-uttha-jñānato 'pi vilakṣaṇaṃ yat tad
GE07bhg4c10u:489: aham eva nāśayāmīti taiḥ kathaṃ tad-arthaṃ prayatanīyam ?
GE07bhg4c10u:490: teṣāṃ nityābhiyuktānāṃ yoga-kṣemaṃ vahāmy ahaṃ [Gītā 9.22] iti mad-uktes
GE07bhg4c10u:491: teṣāṃ vyavahārikaḥ pāramārthikaś ca sarvo 'pi bhāro mayā voḍham aṅgīkṛta eveti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:494: baladevaḥ : nanu cirantanasyāvidyā-timirasya sattvāt teṣāṃ hṛdi kathaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:495: tat-prakāśaḥ syād iti cet tatrāha teṣām eveti |
GE07bhg4c10u:496: teṣām eva māṃ vinā prāṇān dhartum asamarthānāṃ mad-ekāntinām eva, na tu sa-niṣṭhānām anukampārthaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:498: aham evātma-bhāvastho 'ravinda-koṣe bhṛṅga iva tad-bhāve sthito divya-svarūpa-guṇāṃs tatra prakāśayaṃs tad-viṣayaka-jñāna-rūpeṇa bhāsvatā dīpena jñāna-virodhy-anādi-karma-rūpājñāna-jaṃ mad-anya-viṣaya-spṛhā-rūpaṃ tamo nāśayāmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:501: mamaiveti na taiḥ kutrāpy arthe prayatitavyam ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c10u:505: arjuna uvāca paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramaṃ bhavān |
GE07bhg4c10u:506: puruṣaṃ śāśvataṃ divyam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum ||12||
GE07bhg4c10u:507: āhus tvām ṛṣayaḥ sarve devarṣir nāradas tathā |
GE07bhg4c10u:508: asito devalo vyāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva bravīṣi me ||13||
GE07bhg4c10u:509: śrīdharaḥ :saṃkṣepeṇoktāṃ vibhūtiṃ vistareṇa jijñāsuḥ bhagavantaṃ stuvann arjuna uvāca paraṃ brahmeti saptabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:511: paramaṃ ca pavitraṃ ca bhavān eva |
GE07bhg4c10u:512: kuta iti ? ata āha yataḥ śāśvataṃ nityaṃ puruṣam
GE07bhg4c10u:519: ke ta iti ? āha āhur iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:522: asitaś ca devalaś ca vyāsaś ca svayaṃ tvam eva ca sākṣān me mahyaṃ bravīṣi ||12-13||
GE07bhg4c10u:523: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ bhagavato vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca śrutvā paramotkaṇṭhito
GE07bhg4c10u:525: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma āśrayaḥ prakāśo vā |
GE07bhg4c10u:526: paramaṃ pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ ca bhavān eva |
GE07bhg4c10u:527: yataḥ puruṣam paramātmānaṃ śāśvataṃ sadaika-rūpaṃ divi parame vyomni sva-svarūpe bhavaṃ divyaṃ sva-prapañcātītam ādiṃ ca sarva-kāraṇaṃ devaṃ ca dyotanātmakaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:528: sva-prakāśam ādi-devam ata evājaṃ vibhuṃ sarva-gataṃ tvām āhur iti
GE07bhg4c10u:530: āhuḥ kathayanti tvām ananta-mahimānam ṛṣayas tattva-jñāna-niṣṭhāḥ sarve
GE07bhg4c10u:536: pūrvokta-viśeṣaṇaṃ me mahyam āhuḥ sākṣāt kim anyair vaktṛbhiḥ svayam eva
GE07bhg4c10u:538: atra ṛṣitve 'pi sākṣād-vaktṝṇāṃ nāradādīnām ativiśiṣṭatvāt pṛthag-grahaṇam ||13||
GE07bhg4c10u:539: viśvanāthaḥ : saṅkṣepeṇoktam arthaṃ vistareṇa śrotum icchan stuti-pūrvakam
GE07bhg4c10u:541: paraṃ sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ dhāma śyāmasundaraṃ vapur eva paraṃ brahma |
GE07bhg4c10u:545: dhāma kīdṛśam ? paraṃ pavitraṃ draṣṭṝṇām avidyā-mālinya-haram ataeva ṛṣayo 'pi tvāṃ śāśvataṃ puruṣam āhuḥ puruṣākārasyāsya nityatvaṃ vadanti ||12-13||
GE07bhg4c10u:546: baladevaḥ : saṅkṣepeṇa śrutāṃ vibhūtiṃ vistareṇa śrotum icchann arjuna uvāca param iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:547: bhavān eva satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma iti śrūyamāṇaṃ paraṃ brahma |
GE07bhg4c10u:548: bhavān eva tasminn evāśritāḥ sarve tad u nātyeti kaścana iti śrūyamāṇaṃ paraṃ dhāma nikhilāśraya-bhūtaṃ vastu |
GE07bhg4c10u:549: bhavān eva paramaṃ pavitraṃ jñātvā devaṃ mucyate sarva-pāpaiḥ sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ tarati nainaṃ pāpmā tarati ity ādi śrūyamāṇaṃ smartur akhila-pāpa-haraṃ vastu ity ahaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:551: tathā sarve tad-anukampitā ṛṣayas teṣu pradhāna-bhūtā nāradādayaś ca tasmāt kṛṣṇa eva paro devas taṃ dhyāyet taṃ raset taṃ bhajet taṃ yajet
GE07bhg4c10u:553: oṃ tat sat iti janma-jarābhyāṃ bhinnaḥ sthāṇur ayam
GE07bhg4c10u:554: acchedyo 'yaṃ [GTU 2.22] iti śruty-artha-vidas tvāṃ divyaṃ puruṣam
GE07bhg4c10u:555: ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum āhus [Gītā 10.12] tat-kathā-saṃvādeṣu purāṇeṣv itihāseṣu ca svayaṃ ca vravīṣīti ajo 'pi sann avyayātmā [Gītā 4.6] iti yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca [Gītā 10.3] iti ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavaḥ [Gītā 10.8] ity ādibhiḥ ||12-13||
GE07bhg4c10u:557: sarvam etad ṛtaṃ manye yan māṃ vadasi keśava |
GE07bhg4c10u:558: na hi te bhagavan vyaktiṃ vidur devā na dānavāḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c10u:559: śrīdharaḥ : ato mamedānīṃ tvadīyaiśvaryo 'sambhāvanā nivṛttety āha sarvam
GE07bhg4c10u:561: etad-bhāvena paraṃ brahmety ādi sarvam apy ṛtaṃ satyaṃ manye |
GE07bhg4c10u:562: yan māṃ prati tvaṃ kathayasi na me viduḥ sura-gaṇā ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c10u:563: tad api satyam eva manya ity āha na hīti |
GE07bhg4c10u:564: he bhagavan tava vyaktiṃ devā na viduḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:565: | asmad-anugrahārtham iyam abhivyaktir iti na jānanti |
GE07bhg4c10u:566: dānavāś cāsmin nigrahārtham iti na vidur eveti ||14||
GE07bhg4c10u:567: madhusūdanaḥ : sarvam etad uktam ṛṣibhiś ca tvayā ca tad-ṛtaṃ satyam evāhaṃ manye yan māṃ prati vadasi keśava |
GE07bhg4c10u:569: tac ca sarvajñatvāt tvaṃ jānāsīti keśau brahma-rudrau
GE07bhg4c10u:570: sarveśāv apy anukampyayā vātyavagacchatīti vyutpattim āśritya
GE07bhg4c10u:572: ato yad uktaṃ na me viduḥ sura-gaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ [Gītā 10.2] ity ādi tat
GE07bhg4c10u:575: he bhagavan samagraiśvaryādi-sampanna te tava vyaktiṃ prabhāvaṃ jñānātiśaya-śālino 'pi devā na vidur nāpi dānavā na
GE07bhg4c10u:577: viśvanāthaḥ : nātra mama ko 'py aviśvāsa ity āha sarvam iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:578: kiṃ ca te ṛṣayaḥ paraṃ brahma-dhāmānaṃ tvām ajam āhur eva |
GE07bhg4c10u:579: na tu te vyaktiṃ janma viduḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:580: para-brahma-svarūpasya tavājatvaṃ janmavattvaṃ ca kiṃ prakāram iti
GE07bhg4c10u:582: ataeva na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ [Gītā 10.2] iti yat tvayoktaṃ taṃ sarvam ṛtaṃ satyam eva manye
GE07bhg4c10u:583: | he keśava ! ko brahmā īśo rudraś ca tāv api vayase svatattvājñānena
GE07bhg4c10u:584: badhnāsi, kiṃ punaḥ deva-dānavādyās tvāṃ na vidantīti vācyam iti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:586: etat sarvam aham ṛtaṃ satyam eva |
GE07bhg4c10u:590: sva-tattvāparijñānena nibadhnāsi prajāpatiṃ ca rudraṃ ca ity ādi
GE07bhg4c10u:594: śrī-mūrtiṃ deva-dānavāś ca na vidur yat te 'nya-svajātīyatva-buddhyā tvām avajānanti druhyanti ceti bhāvaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c10u:599: svayam eva tvam ātmānaṃ vettha jānāsi nānyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:602: atyādareṇa bahudhā sambodhayati he puruṣottama ! puruṣottamatve hetu-garbhāṇi
GE07bhg4c10u:608: madhusūdanaḥ : yatas tvaṃ teṣāṃ sarveṣām ādir aśakya-jñānaś cātaḥ svayam iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:609: svayam evānyonyapadeśādikam antareṇaiva tvam evātmānā svarūpeṇātmānaṃ nirupādhikaṃ sopādhikaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c10u:612: anyair jñātum aśakyam ahaṃ kathaṃ jānīyām ity āśaṅkām apanudan premautkaṇṭhyena bahudhā sambodhayati he puruṣottama tvad-apekṣayā sarve
GE07bhg4c10u:614: atas teṣām aśakyaṃ sarvottamasya tava śakyam evety abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:615: puruṣottamatvam eva vivṛṇoti punaś caturbhiḥ sambodhanaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:616: bhūtāni sarvāṇi bhāvayaty utpādayatīti he bhūta-bhāvana
GE07bhg4c10u:618: pitāpi kaścin neṣṭas tatrāha he bhūteśa
GE07bhg4c10u:620: niyantāpi kaścin nārādhyas tatrāha he deva-deva
GE07bhg4c10u:623: patis tatrāha he jagat-pate hitāhitopadeśaka-veda-praṇatṛtvena sarvasya jagataḥ pālayitaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:625: sarveṣāṃ guruḥ sarveṣāṃ rājātaḥ sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ sarveṣām ārādhya iti kiṃ vācyaṃ puruṣottamas tvaṃ taveti bhāvaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c10u:626: viśvanāthaḥ : tasmāt tvaṃ svayam evātmānaṃ vettha iti eva-kāreṇa
GE07bhg4c10u:627: tavārjatva-janmavattvādīnāṃ durghaṭānām api vāstavatvam eva tvad-bhakto
GE07bhg4c10u:628: vetti tac ca kena prakāreṇeti tu so 'pi na vettīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:629: tad apy ātmanā svenaiva vettha na sādhanāntareṇa |
GE07bhg4c10u:632: na kevalam uttama eva, yato bhūta-bhāvanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:634: bhūta-bhāvana-rūpā ye tad-ādayaḥ parameṣṭhy-antās teṣām īśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:635: na kevalam īśa eva, yato devais tair eva devaḥ krīḍā yasyeti tvat-krīḍopakāra-bhūtā
GE07bhg4c10u:637: tad apy apārakāruṇya-vaśād jagad-vartinā man mādṛśānām api tvam eva patir bhavasi iti catūrṇāṃ sambodhana-padānām arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:638: yad vā puruṣottamatvam eva vivṛṇoti he bhūta-bhāvana sarva-bhūta-pitaḥ ! pitāpi kaścin neṣṭe ? tatrāha he bhūteśa ! bhūteśo 'pi kaścin nārādhyas tatrāha
GE07bhg4c10u:639: he devadeva ! devārādhyo 'pi kaścin na pālayatīti tatrāha he jagat-pate
GE07bhg4c10u:640: baladevaḥ : svayam eva tvam ātmānā svenaiva jñānenātmānaṃ saṃvettha idam ittham iti jānāsi
GE07bhg4c10u:641: ye deveṣu dānaveṣu ca tvad-bhaktās te tādṛśīṃ tvan-mūrtiṃ vastu-bhūtāṃ jānanty eva tasyās tathātve kathaṃ tāṃ na jānantīty eva-kārāt |
GE07bhg4c10u:642: he puruṣottama sarva-puruṣeśvara ! puruṣottamas tvaṃ vivṛṇvan sambodhayati he bhūta-bhāvana ! sarva-prāṇi-janaka !
GE07bhg4c10u:643: bhūta-bhāvano 'pi kaścin neṣṭo, tatrāha he bhūteśa ! sarva-prāṇi-niyantaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:644: ! bhūteśo 'pi kaścin na pūjyas tatrāha he devadeva ! sarvārādhyānām api devānām ārādhya ! devadevo 'pi kaścin na rakṣakas tatrāha he jagat-pate !
GE07bhg4c10u:645: hitāhitopadeśena jīvikārpaṇena ca viśva-pālaka ! īdṛśasya te tattvaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:648: vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ yābhir vibhūtibhir lokān imāṃs tvaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhasi
GE07bhg4c10u:649: śrīdharaḥ : yasmāt tavābhivyaktiṃ tvam eva vetsi na devādayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:651: yā ātmanas tava divyā atyadbhutā vibhūtayas tā sarvā vaktuṃ tvam evārhasi yogyo 'si |
GE07bhg4c10u:653: madhusūdanaḥ : yasmād anyeṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ jñātum aśakyā avaśyaṃ jñātavyāś ca tava vibhūtayas tasmāt vaktum iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:654: yābhir vibhūtibhir imān sarvān lokān vyāpya tvaṃ tiṣṭhasi tās tavāsādhāraṇā vibhūtayo divyā asarvajñair jñātum aśakyā hi yasmāt tasmāt sarvajñas tvam eva tā aśeṣeṇa vaktum arhasi ||16||
GE07bhg4c10u:655: viśvanāthaḥ : tava tattvaṃ durgamaṃ tava vibhūtiṣv eva mama jijñāsā jāyata
GE07bhg4c10u:657: divyā utkṛṣṭā yā ātma-vibhūtayas tāvad vaktum arhasīty anvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:658: nanv aśeṣeṇa mad-vibhūtayaḥ sarvā vaktum aśakyā
GE07bhg4c10u:660: baladevaḥ : tvat-svarūpa-yāthātmyaṃ khalu kathaṃ tathā durgamevātas
GE07bhg4c10u:661: tvad-vibhūtiṣv eva maj-jijñāsopajāyata iti sūcayann āha vaktum iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:662: divyā utkṛṣṭās tad-asādhāraṇīyātmano vibhūtīr aśeṣeṇa vaktum arhasi dvitīyārthe prathamā
GE07bhg4c10u:663: yābhir viśiṣṭas tvam imān lokān vyāpya niyamya tiṣṭhasi ||16||
GE07bhg4c10u:665: kathaṃ vidyām ahaṃ yogiṃs tvāṃ sadā paricintayan |
GE07bhg4c10u:666: keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cintyo 'si bhagavan mayā ||17||
GE07bhg4c10u:667: śrīdharaḥ : kathana-prayojanaṃ darśayan prārthayate katham iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c10u:668: he yogin kathaṃ kair vibhūti-bhedaiḥ sadā paricintayann ahaṃ tvāṃ vidyāṃ jānīyām ? vibhūti-bhedena cintyo 'pi tvaṃ keṣu keṣu padārtheṣu mayā cintanīyo 'si ? ||17||
GE07bhg4c10u:669: madhusūdanaḥ : kiṃ prayojanaṃ tat-kathanasya tad āha katham iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c10u:670: yogo niratiśayaiśvaryādi-śaktiḥ so 'syāstīti he yogin niratiśaiśvaryādi-śakti-śālinn aham atisthūlamatis tvāṃ devādibhir api jñātum aśakyaṃ kathaṃ vidyāṃ jānīyāṃ sadā paricintayan sarvadā dhyāyan |
GE07bhg4c10u:671: nanu mad-vibhūtiṣu māṃ dhyāyan jñāsyasi tatrāha keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cetanācetanātmakeṣu vastuṣu tvad-vibhūti-bhūteṣu mayā cintyo 'si he bhagavan ||17||
GE07bhg4c10u:672: viśvanāthaḥ : yogo yoga-māyā-śaktir vartate yasya he yogin vanamālītivat |
GE07bhg4c10u:673: tvām ahaṃ kathaṃ paricintayan san tvāṃ sadā vidyāṃ jānīyām ? bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ [BhP 11.14.11] iti tvad-ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:674: tathā keṣu bhāveṣu padārtheṣu tvaṃ cintyaḥ tvac-cintana-bhaktir mayā kartavyety arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:675: baladevaḥ : nanu kimarthaṃ tat-kathanṃ tatrāha katham iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:677: yoga-māyā-śaktir asty asyeti he yogin ! tvāṃ sadā paricintayan saṃsmarann ahaṃ kalyāṇānanta-guṇa-yoginaṃ kathaṃ vidyāṃ jānīyām ? keṣu keṣu ca
GE07bhg4c10u:678: bhāveṣu padārtheṣu prakāśamānas tvaṃ mayā cintyo dhyeyo 'si ? tad etad ubhayaṃ vada |
GE07bhg4c10u:679: tac ca vibhūty-uddeśenaiva setsyatīti tām upadiśety arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:682: bhūyaḥ kathaya tṛptir hi śṛṇvato nāsti me 'mṛtam ||18||
GE07bhg4c10u:683: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ bahirmukho 'pi citte tatra tatra vibhūti-bhedena
GE07bhg4c10u:684: tvac-cintaiva yathā bhavet tathā vistareṇa kathayaty āha vistareṇeti |
GE07bhg4c10u:685: ātmanas tava yogaṃ sarvajñatva-sarva-śaktitvādi-lakṣaṇaṃ yogaiśvaryaṃ vibhūtiṃ ca vistareṇa punaḥ kathaya |
GE07bhg4c10u:687: śṛṇvato mama tṛptir alaṃ buddhir nāsti ||18||
GE07bhg4c10u:691: dhyānālambanaṃ vistareṇa saṃkṣepeṇa saptame navame coktam api bhūyaḥ kathaya sarvair janair abhyudaya-niḥśreyasa-prayojanaṃ yācyasa iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:692: he janārdana ! ato mamāpi yācñā tvayy ucitaiva |
GE07bhg4c10u:693: uktasya punaḥ kathanaṃ kuto yācase tatrāha tṛptir alaṃ-pratyayenecchā-vicchittir nāsti hi
GE07bhg4c10u:694: chṛṇvataḥ śravaṇena pibatas tvad-vākyam amṛtam amṛtavat pade pade svādu svādu |
GE07bhg4c10u:697: viśvanāthaḥ : nana ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate [Gītā
GE07bhg4c10u:698: 10.8] ity anenaiva sarve padārthā mad-vibhūtayo mad-uktā eva vibhūtayas tathā iti matvā bhajante mām iti bhakti-yogaś cokta eva |
GE07bhg4c10u:700: he janārdaneti mādṛśa-janānāṃ tvam eva hitopadeśa-mādhuryeṇa
GE07bhg4c10u:701: lobham utpādyārdayase yācayasīti vayaṃ kiṃ kurma iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:703: baladevaḥ : nanu pūrva-pūrvatra ajo 'pi sann [Gītā 4.6] ity
GE07bhg4c10u:705: cāsakṛt kathitāḥ, kiṃ punaḥ pṛcchasīti cet tatrāha vistareṇeti |
GE07bhg4c10u:708: tvad-vākyam amṛtaṃ śṛṇvataḥ śrotra-rasanayāsvādayato mama tṛptir nāsti |
GE07bhg4c10u:712: śrī-bhagavān uvāca hanta te kathayiṣyāmi divyā hy ātma-vibhūtayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:713: prādhānyataḥ kuru-śreṣṭha nāsty anto vistarasya me ||19||
GE07bhg4c10u:714: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ prārthitaḥ san bhagavān uvāca hanteti |
GE07bhg4c10u:716: divyā yā mad-vibhūtayas tāḥ prādhānyena te tubhyaṃ kathayiṣyāmi yato 'vāntarasya vibhūti-vistarasya madīyasyānto nāsti |
GE07bhg4c10u:721: yat tvayā prārthitaṃ tat kariṣyāmi mā vyākulo bhūr ity arjunaṃ samāśvāsya tad eva kartum ārabhate
GE07bhg4c10u:722: kathayiṣyāmi prādhānyatas tā vibhūtīr yā divyā hi prasiddhā ātmano mamāsādhāraṇā vibhūtayo he kuru-śreṣṭha ! vistareṇa tu kathanam aśakyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c10u:723: yato nāsty antyo vistarasya me vibhūtīnām |
GE07bhg4c10u:724: ataḥ pradhāna-bhūtāḥ kāścid eva vibhūtīr vakṣyāmīty arthaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c10u:725: viśvanāthaḥ : hantety anukampāyāṃ prādhānyataḥ prādhānyena yatas tāsāṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:727: vibhūtayo vibhūtīr divyā uttamā eva na tu tṛṇeṣṭakādyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:728: atra vibhūti-śabdena prākṛtāprākṛta-vastūny evocyate tāni sarvāṇy eva bhagavac-chakti-samudbhūtatvād bhagavad-rūpeṇaiva tāratamyena dhyeyatvenābhimatāni jñeyāni ||19||
GE07bhg4c10u:729: baladevaḥ : evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ śrī-bhagavān uvāca hanteti |
GE07bhg4c10u:733: prādhānyataḥ prādhānyena yatas tāsāṃ vistarasyānto nāsti |
GE07bhg4c10u:735: vibhūti-śabdena niyāmakatva-rūpāṇy aiśvaryāṇi bodhyāni vibhūtir bhūtir aiśvaryam ity amara-koṣāt
GE07bhg4c10u:737: tāni sarvāṇi sarveśa-śakti-vyaṅgatvāt sarveśātmnaā tāratamyena bhāvyāni |
GE07bhg4c10u:739: tāni tu tena rūpeṇa bhāvanārthāny eva, na tv anyavat tac-chakty-ekadeśa-rūpāṇīti
GE07bhg4c10u:743: aham ādiś ca madhyaṃ ca bhūtānām anta eva ca ||20||
GE07bhg4c10u:744: śrīdharaḥ : tatra prathamam aiśvaraṃ rūpaṃ kathayati he guḍākeśa !
GE07bhg4c10u:750: sarva-bhūtānāṃ janmādi-hetuś ca aham evety arthaḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c10u:751: madhusūdanaḥ : tatra prathamaṃ tāvan mukhyaṃ cintanīyaṃ śṛṇu aham iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:752: sarva-bhūtānām āśaye hṛd-deśe 'ntaryāmi-rūpeṇa pratyag-ātma-rūpeṇa ca sthita ātmā caitanyānanda-ghanas tvayāhaṃ vāsudeva eveti dhyeyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:754: evaṃ dhyānāsāmarthye tu vakṣyamāṇāni dhyānāni kāryāṇi |
GE07bhg4c10u:755: tatrāpy ādau dhyeyam āha - aham evādiś cotpattir bhūtānāṃ prāṇināṃ cetanatvena loke vyavahriyamāṇānāṃ madhyaṃ ca sthitir antaś ca nāśaḥ sarva-cetana-vargāṇām utpatti-sthita-nāśa-rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c10u:756: tat-kāraṇa-rūpeṇa cāham eva dhyeya ity arthaḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c10u:757: viśvanāthaḥ : atra prathamaṃ mām evaikāṃśena sarva-vibhūti-kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ bhāvayety āha aham iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:759: he guḍākeśa jita-nidra iti dhyāna-sāmarthyaṃ sūcayati !
GE07bhg4c10u:760: sarva-bhūto yo vairājas tasyāśaye sthita iti samaṣṭi-virāḍ antaryāmī |
GE07bhg4c10u:761: tathā sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām āśaye sthita iti vyaṣṭi-virāḍ antaryāmī ca |
GE07bhg4c10u:762: bhūtānāṃ ādir janma madhyaṃ sthitir antaḥ saṃhāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:764: baladevaḥ : tatra tāvan mām eva tvaṃ mahat-sraṣṭādi-tri-rūpeṇa svāṃśena
GE07bhg4c10u:771: pradhānādi-pṛthivy-anta-tattva-rūpā yā mūla-prakṛtis tasyā āśaye 'ntaḥ-karaṇodaśaya-rūpeṇāham eva prakṛty-antaryāmī sthitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:775: sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām jīvānām āśaye kṣīroda-śaya-rūpeṇāham eva vyaṣṭi-virāḍ antaryāmī sthita iti tāni trīṇi rūpāṇi mad-vibhūtitvena tvayā vincintyānīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:776: subālopaniṣadi prakṛty-ādi-sarva-bhūtāntaryāmī sarva-śeṣī ca nārāyaṇaḥ paṭhyate |
GE07bhg4c10u:778: viṣṇos tu trīṇi rūpāṇi puruṣākhyāny atho viduḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:779: ekaṃ tu mahataḥ sraṣṭṛ dvitīyaṃ tantu-saṃsthitam |
GE07bhg4c10u:780: tṛtīyaṃ sarva-bhūtasthaṃ tāni jñātvā vimucyate || iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:784: bhūtānām ādir utpattir madhyaṃ pālanam antaś ca saṃhāras tat-tad-dhetur
GE07bhg4c10u:787: ādityānām ahaṃ viṣṇur jyotiṣāṃ ravir aṃśumān |
GE07bhg4c10u:788: marīcir marutām asmi nakṣatrāṇām ahaṃ śaśī ||21||
GE07bhg4c10u:789: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ vibhūtīḥ kathayati ādityānām ity ādinā
GE07bhg4c10u:792: | jyotiṣāṃ prakāśakānāṃ madhye 'ṃśumān viśva-vyāpi-raśmi-yukto raviḥ sūryo 'ham |
GE07bhg4c10u:797: te ca avahaḥ pravaho vivahaḥ parāvaha udvahaḥ saṃvaha parivaha iti spata marud-gaṇāḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:799: madhusūdanaḥ : etad-aśaktena bāhyāni dhyānāni kāryāṇīty āha
GE07bhg4c10u:806: marīci-nāmāham nakṣatrāṇām adhipatir ahaṃ śaśī candramāḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:809: kvacit sambandhe 'pi yathā bhūtānām asmi cetanety ādau |
GE07bhg4c10u:811: sarvaiśvarya-śālino 'py anena rūpeṇa dhyāna-vivakṣayā vibhūtiṣu paṭhyante |
GE07bhg4c10u:812: vṛṣṇīnāṃ vāsudevo 'smīti tena rūpeṇa dhyāna-vivakṣayā savasyāpi
GE07bhg4c10u:814: ataḥ paraṃ ca prāyeṇāyam adhyāyaḥ spaṣṭārtha iti kvacit kvacid vyākhyāsyāmaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c10u:815: viśvanāthaḥ : atha nirdhāraṇa-ṣaṣṭhyā kvacit sambandha-ṣaṣṭhyā ca vibhutīr āha yāvad-adhyāya-samāptiḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:816: ādityānāṃ dvādaśānāṃ madhye viṣṇur aham iti
GE07bhg4c10u:818: evaṃ sarvatra prakāśakānāṃ jyotiṣāṃ madhye aṃśumān mahā-kiraṇa-mālī ravir aham |
GE07bhg4c10u:821: baladevaḥ : ādityānāṃ dvādaśānāṃ madhye viṣṇur vāmano 'ham |
GE07bhg4c10u:822: jyotiṣāṃ prakāśānāṃ madhye 'ṃśumān viśva-vyāpi-raśmī ravir aham |
GE07bhg4c10u:827: atra nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī prāyeṇa kvacit sambandhe
GE07bhg4c10u:831: indriyāṇāṃ manaś cāsmi bhūtānām asmi cetanā ||22||
GE07bhg4c10u:836: madhusūdanaḥ : catūrṇāṃ vedānāṃ madhye gāna-mādhuryeṇātiramaṇīyaḥ sāmavedo
GE07bhg4c10u:840: bhūtānāṃ sarva-prāṇi-sambandhināṃ pariṇāmānāṃ madhye cid-abhivyañjikā buddher vṛttiś cetanāham asmi ||22||
GE07bhg4c10u:844: devānāṃ madhye vāsavas teṣāṃ rājā indro 'ham |
GE07bhg4c10u:845: indriyāṇāṃ madhye durjayaṃ teṣāṃ pravartakaṃ ca mano 'ham |
GE07bhg4c10u:849: vasūnāṃ pāvakaś cāsmi meruḥ śikhariṇām aham ||23||
GE07bhg4c10u:851: rakṣasām api krūratvādi-sāmyād yakṣaiḥ sahaikīkṛtya nirdeśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:856: vitteśo dhanādhyakṣaḥ kubero yakṣa-rakṣasāṃ yakṣānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c10u:858: | meruḥ sumeruḥ śikhariṇām śikharavatām atyucchritānāṃ parvatānām ||23||
GE07bhg4c10u:860: baladevaḥ : rudrāṇām ekādaśānāṃ madhye śaṅkarākhyo rudro 'ham |
GE07bhg4c10u:866: purodhasāṃ ca mukhyaṃ māṃ viddhi pārtha bṛhaspatim |
GE07bhg4c10u:867: senānīnām ahaṃ skandaḥ sarasām asmi sāgaraḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c10u:869: purodhasāṃ madhye deva-purohitatvān mukhyaṃ bṛhaspatim māṃ viddhi |
GE07bhg4c10u:872: madhusūdanaḥ : indrasya sarva-rāja-śreṣṭhatvāt tat-purodhasaṃ bṛhaspatiṃ sarveṣāṃ purodhasāṃ rāja-purohitānāṃ madhye mukhyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mām eva he
GE07bhg4c10u:874: senānīnām senāpatīnāṃ madhye deva-senāpatiḥ skando guho 'ham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:875: sarasām deva-khāta-jalāśayānāṃ madhye sāgaraḥ sagara-putraiḥ khāto jalāśayo 'ham asmi ||24||
GE07bhg4c10u:879: sarva-patiṃ rāja-purohitānāṃ mukhyaṃ māṃ viddhīti so 'ham ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:884: maharṣīṇāṃ bhṛgur ahaṃ girām asmy ekam akṣaram |
GE07bhg4c10u:887: girāṃ vācāṃ padātmikānāṃ madhye ekam akṣaram oṅkārākhyaṃ padam asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:890: madhusūdanaḥ : maharṣīṇāṃ sapta-brahmaṇāṃ madhye bhṛgur atitejasvitvād
GE07bhg4c10u:892: girāṃ vācāṃ pada-lakṣaṇānāṃ madhya ekam akṣaram padam oṃkāro 'ham
GE07bhg4c10u:897: śikharavatāṃ madhye hi merur aham ity uktam ataḥ sthāvaratvena śikharatvena
GE07bhg4c10u:900: baladevaḥ : maharṣīṇāṃ brahma-putrāṇāṃ madhye 'titejasvī bhṛgur aham |
GE07bhg4c10u:901: girāṃ pada-lakṣaṇānāṃ vācāṃ madhye ekam akṣaram praṇavo 'ham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:909: devā eva santo ye mantra-darśanena ṛṣitvaṃ prāptās teṣāṃ madhye nārado 'smi |
GE07bhg4c10u:912: madhusūdanaḥ : sarvaeṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ vanaspatīnām anyeṣāṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c10u:913: devā eva santo ye mantra-darśitvena ṛṣitvaṃ prāptās te devarṣayas teṣāṃ madhye nārado
GE07bhg4c10u:915: gandharvāṇāṃ gāna-dharmaṇāṃ deva-gāyakānāṃ madhye citraratho 'ham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:923: siddhānāṃ svābhāvikāṇimādimatāṃ kapilaḥ kārdamir munir aham ||26||
GE07bhg4c10u:928: amṛtārthaṃ kṣīrodadhi-manthanād udbhūtam uccaiḥśravasam nāmāśvaṃ mad-vibhūtiṃ viddhi |
GE07bhg4c10u:931: madhusūdanaḥ : aśvānāṃ madhya uccaiḥśravasam amṛta-mathanodbhavam aśvaṃ māṃ viddhi |
GE07bhg4c10u:932: airāvataṃ gajam amṛta-mathanodbhavam gajendrāṇāṃ madhye māṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:934: narāṇāṃ ca madhye narādhipaṃ rājānaṃ māṃ viddhīty anuṣajyate ||27||
GE07bhg4c10u:937: gajendrāṇāṃ madhye airāvataṃ ca māṃ viddhi |
GE07bhg4c10u:938: amṛtodbhavam amṛtārthakāt kṣīrābdhi-mathanāj jātam iti dvayor viśeṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c10u:941: āyudhānām ahaṃ vajraṃ dhenūnām asmi kāmadhuk |
GE07bhg4c10u:942: prajanaś cāsmi kandarpaḥ sarpāṇām asmi vāsukiḥ ||28||
GE07bhg4c10u:947: na kevalaṃ sambhoga-mātra-pradhānaḥ kāmo mad-vibhūtir aśāstrīyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c10u:949: madhusūdanaḥ : āyudhānāṃ astrāṇāṃ madhye vajraṃ dadhīcer asth-sambhavam
GE07bhg4c10u:951: dhenūnāṃ dogdhrīṇāṃ madhye kāmaṃ dogdhīti kāma-dhuk |
GE07bhg4c10u:953: kāmānāṃ madhye prajanaḥ prajanayitā putrotpatty-artho yaḥ kandarpaḥ kāmaḥ so 'ham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:955: sarpāś ca nāgāś ca jāti-bhedād bhidyante |
GE07bhg4c10u:956: tatra sarpāṇām madhye teṣāṃ rājā vāsukir aham asmi ||28||
GE07bhg4c10u:960: baladevaḥ : āyudhānāṃ madhye vajraṃ pavir aham |
GE07bhg4c10u:968: anantaś cāsmi nāgānāṃ varuṇo yādasām aham |
GE07bhg4c10u:969: pitṝṇām aryamā cāsmi yamaḥ saṃyamatām aham ||29||
GE07bhg4c10u:976: madhusūdanaḥ : nāgānāṃ jāti-bhedānāṃ madhye teṣāṃ rājānantaś ca śeṣākhyo 'ham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:977: yādasām jala-carāṇāṃ madhye teṣāṃ rājā varuṇo 'ham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:978: pitṝṇām madhye 'ryamā nāma pitṛ-rājaś cāham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:979: saṃyamatām saṃyamaṃ dharmādharma-phala-dānenānugrahaṃ nigrahaṃ ca kurvatāṃ madhye yamo
GE07bhg4c10u:987: saṃyamatām daṇḍayatāṃ madhye nyāya-daṇḍa-kṛt yamo 'haṃ chādeśābhāva ārṣaḥ ||29||
GE07bhg4c10u:989: prahlādaś cāsmi daityānāṃ kālaḥ kalayatām aham |
GE07bhg4c10u:990: mṛgāṇāṃ ca mṛgendro 'haṃ vainateyaś ca pakṣiṇām ||30||
GE07bhg4c10u:992: kalayatāṃ vaśīkurvatāṃ gaṇayatāṃ vā madhye kālo
GE07bhg4c10u:996: madhusūdanaḥ : daityānāṃ diti-vaṃśyānāṃ madhye prakarṣeṇa hlādayaty
GE07bhg4c10u:997: ānandayati parama-sāttvikatvena sarvān iti prahlādaś cāsmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:998: kalayatāṃ saṅkhyānaṃ gaṇanaṃ kurvatāṃ madhye kālo 'ham |
GE07bhg4c10u:1004: baladevaḥ : daityānāṃ diti-vaṃśyānāṃ madhye teṣām adhipatir
GE07bhg4c10u:1010: pavanaḥ pavatām asmi rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām aham |
GE07bhg4c10u:1011: jhaṣāṇāṃ makaraś cāsmi srotasām asmi jāhnavī ||31||
GE07bhg4c10u:1013: pavatāṃ pāvayitṝṇāṃ vegavatāṃ vā madhye vāyur aham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:1016: jhaṣāṇāṃ matsyānāṃ madhye makaro nāma matsya-jāti-viśeṣo
GE07bhg4c10u:1019: madhusūdanaḥ : pavatāṃ pāvayitṝṇāṃ vegavatāṃ vā madhye pavano vāyur aham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:1020: śastrabhṛtām śastra-dhāriṇāṃ yuddha-kuśalānāṃ madhye rāmo dāśarathir akhila-rākṣasa-kula-kṣaya-karaḥ parama-vīro 'ham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:1021: sākṣāt-svarūpasyāpy anena rūpeṇa cintanārthaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ vāsudevo 'smītivad
GE07bhg4c10u:1023: jhaṣāṇāṃ matsyānāṃ madhye makaro nāma taj-jāti-viśeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1024: srotasām vegena calaj-jalānāṃ nadīnāṃ madhye sarva-nadī-śreṣṭhā jāhnavī gaṅgāham asmi ||31||
GE07bhg4c10u:1025: viśvanāthaḥ : pavatāṃ vegavatāṃ pavitrīkurvatāṃ vā madhye rāmaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:1026: paraśurāmas tasyāveśāvatāratvād āveśānāṃ ca jīva-viśeṣatvād yuktam eva vibhūtitvam |
GE07bhg4c10u:1028: etat te kathitaṃ devi jāmadagner mahātmanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1033: ta āveśā nigadyante jīvā eva mahattamāḥ || [LBhāg 1.1.18] iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:1036: baladevaḥ : pavatāṃ pāvanānāṃ vegavatāṃ ca madhye pavano vāyur aham |
GE07bhg4c10u:1041: sargāṇām ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ caivāham arjuna |
GE07bhg4c10u:1046: aham ādiś ca madhyaṃ cety atra sṛṣṭy-ādi-kartṛtvaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:1051: pravadatāṃ vādināṃ sambandhinyo vāda-jalpa-vitaṇḍākhyās tisraḥ kathāḥ prasiddhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1053: yatra dvābhyām api pramāṇatas tarkataś ca svapakṣaḥ sthāpyate para-pakṣaś ca cchala-jāti-nigraha-sthānais
GE07bhg4c10u:1054: dūṣayati na tu sva-pakṣaṃ sthāpayati, sā vitaṇḍā nāma kathā |
GE07bhg4c10u:1057: vādas tu vīta-rāgayoḥ śiṣyācāryayor anyayor vā tattva-nirūpaṇa-phalaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1060: madhusūdanaḥ : sargāṇām acetana-sṛṣṭīnām ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:1063: bhūtānāṃ jīvāviṣṭānāṃ cetanatvena prasiddhānām evādir antaś ca madhyaṃ cety uktam upakrame, iha tv acetana-sargāṇām iti na paunaruktyam |
GE07bhg4c10u:1068: bhūtānām asmi cetanety atra yathā bhūta-śabdena tat-sambandhinaḥ pariṇāmā lakṣitās tatheha pravadac-chabdena tat-sambandhinaḥ kathā-bhedā lakṣyante |
GE07bhg4c10u:1072: tattva-bubhutsvor vītarāgayoḥ sa-brahmacāriṇor guru-śiṣyayor vā pramāṇena tarkeṇa ca sādhana-dūṣaṇātmā
GE07bhg4c10u:1081: chala-jāti-nigraha-sthānaiḥ para-pakṣo dūṣyata iti jalpe vitaṇḍāyāṃ ca samānam |
GE07bhg4c10u:1082: tatra vitaṇḍāyām ekena sva-pakṣaḥ sthāpyata eva, anyena ca sa
GE07bhg4c10u:1084: jalpe tūbhābhyām api sva-pakṣaḥ sthāpyata ubhābhyām api
GE07bhg4c10u:1086: tad uktaṃ yathoktopapanna-cchala-jāti-nigraha-sthāna-sādhanopalambho jalpaḥ sa pratipakṣa-sthāpanā-hīno vitaṇḍā iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:1087: ato vitaṇḍā-dvaya-śarīratvāj jalpo nāma naikā kathā, kintu śakty-atiśaya-jñānārthaṃ samaya-bandha-mātreṇa
GE07bhg4c10u:1089: tattvādhyvasāya-paryavasāyitvena tu vādasya śreṣṭhatvam uktam eva ||32||
GE07bhg4c10u:1090: viśvanāthaḥ : sṛjyanta iti sargā ākāśādayas teṣām ādiḥ sṛṣṭir antaḥ saṃhāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1093: aham ādiś ca madhyaṃ cety atra sṛṣṭy-ādi-kartā
GE07bhg4c10u:1095: vidyānāṃ jñānānāṃ madhye aham ātma-vidyā ātma-jñānam
GE07bhg4c10u:1099: baladevaḥ : sargāṇāṃ mahad-ādīnāṃ jaḍa-sṛṣṭīnām ādir anto madhyaṃ cāham iti teṣāṃ sarga-saṃhāra-pālanāni mad-vibhūtitayā bhāvyānīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1100: aham ādiś ca ity ādau mat-svāṃśa-cetanānāṃ bhūtānāṃ sargādi-hetur mad-vibhūtir
GE07bhg4c10u:1103: dharma-śāstraṃ purāṇaṃ ca vidyā hy etāś caturdaśa ||
GE07bhg4c10u:1107: teṣāṃ khalu vāda-jalpa-vitaṇḍās tisraḥ kathāḥ prasiddhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1109: yatrobhābhyāṃ pramāṇena tarkenṇa sva-pakṣaḥ sthāpyate chala-jāti-nigraha-sthānaiḥ para-pakṣo
GE07bhg4c10u:1122: tathā ca śrutiḥ akāro vai sarvā vāk saiṣā sparśoṣambhir vyajyamānā bahvī nānā-rūpā bhavati [Ai.Ā. 1.3.6] iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:1123: sāmāsikasya samāsa-samūhasya madhye dvandvaḥ rāma-kṛṣṇāv ity-ādi-sāmāso
GE07bhg4c10u:1128: kālaḥ kalayatām aham ity atrāyur gaṇanātmakaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:1130: sa ca tasminn āyuṣi kṣīṇe sati kṣīyate |
GE07bhg4c10u:1131: atra tu pravāhātmako 'kṣayaḥ kāla ucyate iti viśeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1134: madhusūdanaḥ : akṣarāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ varṇānāṃ madhye 'kāro 'ham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:1136: vai sarvā vāk [Ai.Ā. 1.3.6] iti śrutes tasya śreṣṭhatvaṃ prasiddham |
GE07bhg4c10u:1140: uttara-padārtha-pradhānas tatpuruṣo 'nyapadārtha-pradhāno bahuvrīhir iti teṣām ubhaya-padārtha-sāmyābhāvenāpakṛṣṭatvāt
GE07bhg4c10u:1141: kṣayi-kālābhimāny akṣayaḥ kālaḥ jñaḥ kāla-kālo guṇī sarva-vidyaḥ ity ādi-śruti-prasiddho 'ham eva |
GE07bhg4c10u:1142: kālaḥ kalayatām aham ity atra tu kṣayī kāla ukta iti bhedaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1143: karma-phala-vidhātṝṇāṃ madhye viśvatomukhaḥ sarvato mukho dhātā sarva-karma-phala-dāteśvaro 'ham ity arthaḥ ||33||
GE07bhg4c10u:1144: viśvanāthaḥ : sāmāsikasya samāsa-samūhasya madhye dvandvaḥ ubhaya-padārtha-pradhānatvena tasya samāseṣu śraiṣṭhyāt |
GE07bhg4c10u:1145: akṣayaḥ kālaḥ saṃhartṝṇāṃ madhye mahākālo rudro viśvatomukhaś caturbhyo 'haṃ dhātā sraṣṭṝṇāṃ madhye brahmā ||33||
GE07bhg4c10u:1147: a-kāro vai sarvā vāk [Ai.Ā. 1.3.6] iti śrutiś ca |
GE07bhg4c10u:1156: mṛtyuḥ sarvaharaś cāham udbhavaś ca bhaviṣyatām |
GE07bhg4c10u:1157: kīrtiḥ śrīr vāk ca nārīṇāṃ smṛtir medhā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā ||34||
GE07bhg4c10u:1163: ābhāsa-mātra-yogena prāṇinaḥ ślāghyā bhavanti tāḥ kīrty-ādyāḥ striyo
GE07bhg4c10u:1167: bhaviṣyatāṃ bhāvi-kalyāṇānāṃ ya udbhava utkarṣaḥ sa cāham eva |
GE07bhg4c10u:1168: nārīṇāṃ madhye kīrtiḥ śrīr vāk smṛtir medhā dhṛtiḥ kṣameti ca sapta dharma-patnyo 'ham eva |
GE07bhg4c10u:1173: vāk sarasvatī sarvasyārthasya prakāśikā saṃskṛtā vāṇī |
GE07bhg4c10u:1185: sarva-lokādaraṇīyo bhavati tāsāṃ sarva-strīṣūttamatvam atiprasiddham eva ||34||
GE07bhg4c10u:1186: viśvanāthaḥ : prātikṣaṇikānāṃ mṛtyūnāṃ madhye sarvaharaḥ sarva-smṛti-haro
GE07bhg4c10u:1187: mṛtyur ahaṃ yad uktaṃ mṛtyur atyanta-vismṛtiḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:1188: bhaviṣyatāṃ bhāvināṃ prāṇi-vikārāṇāṃ madhye udbhavaḥ prathama-vikāro jagmāham |
GE07bhg4c10u:1190: śrīḥ kāntiḥ vāk saṃsmṛtā vāṇīti tisras tathā smṛty-ādayaś
GE07bhg4c10u:1191: catasraḥ ca-kārāt mūrtyādayaś cānyā dharma-patnyaś cāham ||34||
GE07bhg4c10u:1192: baladevaḥ : prātikṣaṇikānāṃ mṛtyūnāṃ madhye sarva-smṛti-haro mṛtyur aham |
GE07bhg4c10u:1193: bhaviṣyatāṃ bhāvināṃ prāṇi-vikārāṇām udbhavo janmākhyaḥ prathama-vikāro
GE07bhg4c10u:1205: kṣamā harṣe viṣāde ca prāpte nirvikāra-cittatā
GE07bhg4c10u:1207: bṛhat-sāma tathā sāmnāṃ gāyatrī chandasām aham |
GE07bhg4c10u:1210: tvām iddhi havāmahe [Rv 6.46.1] ity asyām ṛci
GE07bhg4c10u:1212: tena cendraṃ sarveśvaratvena sthūyata iti śraiṣṭhyam |
GE07bhg4c10u:1216: madhusūdanaḥ : vedānāṃ sāmavedo 'smīty uktaṃ tatrāyam anyo viśeṣaḥ sāmnām ṛg-akṣarārūḍhānāṃ gīti-viśeṣāṇāṃ madhye tvām iddhi havāmaha [Rv 6.46.1]
GE07bhg4c10u:1223: tirṣṭubh-jagatībhyāṃ somāharaṇārthaṃ gatābhyāṃ somo na labdho 'kṣarāṇi ca hāritāni jagatyā trīṇi triṣṭubhaikam iti catvāri tair akṣaraiḥ saha somasyāharaṇena ca sarva-śreṣṭhā gāyatry-ṛg aham |
GE07bhg4c10u:1224: catur-akṣarāṇi ha vā agre chandāṃsy āsutato jagatī somam acchātpat sā trīṇy akṣarāṇi hitvā jagām tatas triṣṭup somam acchāpatat saikam akṣaraṃ hitvāpatat tato gāyatrī somam acchāpatat sā tāni cākṣarāṇi haranty āgacchat somaṃ ca tasmād aṣṭākṣarā gāyatrī ity upakramya tadāhur gāyatrāṇi vai sarvāṇi
GE07bhg4c10u:1225: savanāni gāyatrī hy evaitad upasṛjamānaiḥ iti śatapatha-śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1226: gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtam ity-ādi-chāndogya-śruteś ca |
GE07bhg4c10u:1229: ṛtūnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ madhye kusumākaraḥ sarva-sugandhi-kusumānām ākaro 'tiramaṇīyo vasantaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1238: bṛhat-sāma tvām iddhi havāmahe [Rv 6.46.1] ity asyām ṛci vigīyamānaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:1244: sāmnām ṛg-akṣara-rūḍhānāṃ gīti-viśeṣāṇāṃ madhye tvām iddhi
GE07bhg4c10u:1245: havāmahe [Rv 6.46.1] ity asyām ṛci gītiṃ viśeṣo bṛhat-sāma tac cātirātre pṛṣṭha-stotraṃ sarveśvaratvendra-stuti-rūpam anya-sāmotkṛṣṭatvād aham |
GE07bhg4c10u:1247: ṛg ahaṃ dvijāter dvitīya-janma-hetutvena tasyāḥ śraiṣṭhyāt |
GE07bhg4c10u:1248: gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yad idaṃ kiṃ ca iti brahmāvatāratva-śravaṇāc ca |
GE07bhg4c10u:1250: kusumākaro vasanto 'ham iti śītātapābhāvena vividha-sugandhi-puṣpamayatvena mad-utsava-hetutvena ca tasyānyebhyaḥ śraiṣṭhyāt ||35||
GE07bhg4c10u:1252: dyūtaṃ chalayatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham |
GE07bhg4c10u:1260: madhusūdanaḥ : chalayatāṃ chalasya para-vañcanasya kartṝṇāṃ sambandhi dyūtam akṣa-devanādi-lakṣaṇaṃ sarvasvāpahārakāraṇam aham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:1266: sattvavatāṃ sāttvikānāṃ dharma-jñāna-vairāgyaiśvarya-lakṣaṇaṃ sattva-kāryam evātra sattvam
GE07bhg4c10u:1267: viśvanāthaḥ : chalayatām anyo 'nya-vañcana-parāṇāṃ sambandhi dyūtam asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:1271: baladevaḥ : chalatāṃ mitho vañcanāṃ kurvatāṃ sambandhi dyūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:1279: sattvavatām balināṃ sambandhī sattvaṃ balam aham
GE07bhg4c10u:1282: munīnām apy ahaṃ vyāsaḥ kavīnām uśanā kaviḥ ||37||
GE07bhg4c10u:1287: kavīnāṃ krānta-darśinām uśanā nāma kaviḥ śukraḥ ||37||
GE07bhg4c10u:1288: madhusūdanaḥ : sākṣād īśvarasyāpi vibhūti-madhye pāṭhas tena rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c10u:1292: tathā pāṇḍavānāṃ madhye dhanañjayas tvam evāham |
GE07bhg4c10u:1294: kavīnāṃ krānta-darśināṃ sūkṣmārtha-vivekināṃ madhye uśanā kavir iti khyātaḥ śukro 'ham||37||
GE07bhg4c10u:1295: viśvanāthaḥ : vṛṣṇīnāṃ madhye vāsudevo vasudevo mat-pitā mad-vibhūtiḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1296: prajñāditvāt svārthiko 'ṇ [Pāṇ 5.4.38] vṛṣṇīnām aham evāsmi ity anukter asyānyārthatā neṣṭā
GE07bhg4c10u:1297: baladevaḥ : vṛṣṇīnāṃ madhye vāsudevo vasudeva-putraḥ saṅkarṣaṇo 'ham |
GE07bhg4c10u:1298: na ca vāsudevaḥ kṛṣṇo 'ham iti vyākhyeyaṃ tasya svayaṃrūpasya vibhūtitvāyogāt |
GE07bhg4c10u:1300: vibhūtitvenoktiḥ svāṃśāvatāratvāt tena rūpeṇa cintyatva-vivakṣayā vā yujyate |
GE07bhg4c10u:1302: pāṇḍavānāṃ madhye dhanañjayas tvam aham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:1310: daṇḍo damayatām asmi nītir asmi jigīṣatām |
GE07bhg4c10u:1311: maunaṃ caivāsmi guhyānāṃ jñānaṃ jñānavatām aham ||38||
GE07bhg4c10u:1314: yenāsaṃyatā api saṃyatā bhavanti sa daṇḍo mad-vibhūtiḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1315: jetum icchatāṃ sambandhinī sāmād apy upāya-rūpā nītir asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:1316: guhyānāṃ gopyānāṃ gopana-hetu-maunam avacanam aham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:1318: jñānavatāṃ tattva-jñānināṃ yaj jñānam tad aham asmi ||38||
GE07bhg4c10u:1319: madhusūdanaḥ : damayatām adāntān utpathān pathi pravartayatām utpatha-pravṛttau nigraha-hetur daṇḍo 'ham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:1320: jigīṣatāṃ jetum icchatāṃ nītir nyāyo jayopāyasya prakāśako 'ham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:1321: guhyānāṃ gopyānāṃ gopana-hetur maunaṃ vācaṃ-yamatvam aham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:1324: sa-saṃnyāsa-śravaṇa-manana-pūrvakam ātmano nididhyāsana-lakṣaṇaṃ maunaṃ vāham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:1326: advitīyātma-sākṣātkāra-rūpaṃ sarvājñāna-virodhi jñānaṃ tad aham asmi
GE07bhg4c10u:1330: sat-pathe caranti sa daṇḍo mad-vibhūtir ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1331: jigīṣatāṃ jetum icchatāṃ sambandhinī nītir nyāyo 'ham |
GE07bhg4c10u:1336: yac cāpi sarva-bhūtānāṃ bījaṃ tad aham arjuna |
GE07bhg4c10u:1337: na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram ||39||
GE07bhg4c10u:1339: yad api ca sarva-bhūtānāṃ bījaṃ praroha-kāraṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:1341: tatra hetuḥ -mayā vinā yat syād bhavet tac caram acaraṃ vā bhūtaṃ nāsty eveti ||39||
GE07bhg4c10u:1342: madhusūdanaḥ : yad api ca sarva-bhūtānāṃ praroha-kāraṇaṃ bījaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:1344: he arjuna ! mayā vinā yat syād bhave caram acaraṃ vā bhūtaṃ vastu tan nāsty eva yataḥ sarvaṃ mat-kāryam evety arthaḥ ||39||
GE07bhg4c10u:1345: viśvanāthaḥ : bījaṃ prarohakāraṇaṃ yat tad aham asmi |
GE07bhg4c10u:1346: tatra hetuḥ -- mayā vinā yat syāt caram acaraṃ vā tan naivāsti mithyaivety arthaḥ ||39||
GE07bhg4c10u:1347: baladevaḥ : yac ca sarva-bhūtānāṃ bījaṃ praroha-kāraṇaṃ tad apy aham |
GE07bhg4c10u:1349: mayā sarva-śaktimatāṃ pareśena vinā yac caram acaraṃ ca bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ syāt tan nāsti mṛṣaivety arthaḥ ||39||
GE07bhg4c10u:1352: eṣa tūddeśataḥ prokto vibhūter vistaro mayā ||40||
GE07bhg4c10u:1354: anantatvād vibhūtīnāṃ tāḥ sākalyena vaktuṃ na śakyate |
GE07bhg4c10u:1357: madhusūdanaḥ : prakaraṇārtham upasaṃharan vibhūtiṃ saṃkṣipati nānto 'stīti
GE07bhg4c10u:1358: | he parantapa pareṣāṃ śatrūṇāṃ kāma-krodhya-lobhādīnāṃ tāpa-janaka ! mama divyānāṃ vibhūtīnām anta iyattā nāsti |
GE07bhg4c10u:1359: ataḥ sarvajñenāpi sā na śakyate jñātuṃ vaktuṃ vā san-mātra-viṣayatvāt sarvajñatāyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1360: eṣa tu tvāṃ pratyuddeśata eka-deśena prokto vibhūter vistaro vistāro mayā ||40||
GE07bhg4c10u:1361: viśvanāthaḥ : prakaraṇam upasaṃharati nānto 'stīti eṣa tu vistaro bāhulyam uddeśato nāma-mātrata eva kṛtaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c10u:1363: vistaro vistāra uddeśata eka-deśata eka-deśena proktaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c10u:1365: yad yad vibhūtimat sattvaṃ śrīmad ūrjitam eva vā |
GE07bhg4c10u:1366: tat tad evāvagaccha tvaṃ mama tejo 'ṃśasaṃbhavam ||41||
GE07bhg4c10u:1367: śrīdharaḥ : punaś ca sākaṅkṣaṃ prati kathañcit sākalyena kathayati yad yad
GE07bhg4c10u:1373: tat tad eva mama tejasaḥ prabhāvasyāṃśena sambhūtaṃ jānīhi ||41||
GE07bhg4c10u:1374: madhusūdanaḥ : anuktā api bhagavato vibhūtīḥ saṅgrahītum upalakṣaṇam idam ucyate yad yad iti
GE07bhg4c10u:1376: tathā śrīmat śrīr lakṣmīḥ sampat, śobhā, kāntir vā tayā yuktam |
GE07bhg4c10u:1377: tayorjitaṃ balādy-atiśayena yuktaṃ tat tad eva mama tejasaḥ śakter aṃśena sambhūtaṃ tvam avagaccha jānīhi ||41||
GE07bhg4c10u:1378: viśvanāthaḥ : anuktā api traikālikīr vibhūtīḥ saṅgrahītum āha yad yad iti
GE07bhg4c10u:1382: baladevaḥ : anuktā vibhūtīḥ saṅgrahītum āha yad yad iti |
GE07bhg4c10u:1385: śrīmat saundaryeṇa sampattyā vā yuktam ūrjitaṃ balena yuktaṃ vā yad yat sattvaṃ vastu bhavati, tat tad eva mama tejo 'ṃśena
GE07bhg4c10u:1387: svāyattatva-svavyāpyatvābhyāṃ sarve 'bheda-nirdeśā nītā vāmanādīnāṃ tan-nirdeśās tu saṅgamitāḥ santi ||41||
GE07bhg4c10u:1389: atha vā bahunaitena kiṃ jñātena tavārjuna |
GE07bhg4c10u:1390: viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat ||42||
GE07bhg4c10u:1391: śrīdharaḥ : athavā kim etena paricchinna-vibhūti-darśanena ? sarvatra
GE07bhg4c10u:1392: mad-dṛṣṭim eva kurv ity āha athaveti |
GE07bhg4c10u:1393: bahunā pṛthak-jñātena kiṃ tava kāryam ? yasmād idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad ekāṃśenaika-deśa-mātreṇa viṣṭabhya dhṛtvā vyāpyeti vā aham eva sthitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1395: 'sya viśvā bhūtāni tripādayāmṛtaṃ divi [Rv 8.4.17.3] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1396: tasmāt kim anena paricchinna-darśanena sarvatra mad-dṛṣṭim eva kurv ity
GE07bhg4c10u:1398: indriya-dvārataś citte bahir dhāvati saty api |
GE07bhg4c10u:1402: madhusūdanaḥ : evam avayavaśo vibhūtim uktvā sākalyena tām āha athaveti |
GE07bhg4c10u:1404: bahunaitena sāvaśeṣeṇa jñātena kiṃ tava syāt |
GE07bhg4c10u:1405: he arjuna ! idaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sarvaṃ jagad ekāṃśenaikadeśa-mātreṇa viṣṭabhya vidhṛtya vyāpya vāham eva sthito na mad-vyatiriktaṃ kiṃcid asti pādo 'sya
GE07bhg4c10u:1406: viśvā bhūtāni tripādayāmṛtaṃ divi iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c10u:1408: paricchinna-darśanena sarvatra mad-dṛṣṭim eva kurv ity abhiprāyaḥ ||42||
GE07bhg4c10u:1409: kurvanti ke 'pi kṛtinaḥ kvacid apy anante svāntaṃ vidhāya viṣyāntara-śāntim eva |
GE07bhg4c10u:1411: āsvādya mādyati muhur madhubhin mano me ||
GE07bhg4c10u:1416: viśvanāthaḥ : bahunā pṛthak-pṛthag-jñātena kiṃ phalaṃ samuditam eva jānīhīty āha viṣṭabhyeti
GE07bhg4c10u:1420: niyantṛtvān niyamya vyāpakatvād vyāpya kāraṇatvāt sṛṣṭvā sthito 'smi ||42||
GE07bhg4c10u:1421: viśvaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇa evātaḥ sevas tad-dattayā dhiyā |
GE07bhg4c10u:1425: baladevaḥ : evam avayavaśo vibhūtīr apavarṇya sāmsatyena tāḥ prāha athaveti |
GE07bhg4c10u:1426: bahunā pṛthak-pṛthag-upadiśyamānena vibhūti-viṣayakeṇa jñānena tava kiṃ prayojanam |
GE07bhg4c10u:1428: kṛtsnaṃ jagad aham ekenaiva prakṛtyādy-antaryāmiṇā puruṣākhyenāṃśena viṣṭabhya sraṣṭṛtvāt sraṣṭā dhārakatvād dhṛtvā vyāpakatvād vyāpya pālakatvāt pālayitvā ca sthito 'smīti sarjanādīni mad-vibhūtayo
GE07bhg4c10u:1429: mad-vyāpteṣu sarveṣv aiśvaryādi-sarvāṇi vastūni mad-vibhūtitayā bodhyānīti
GE07bhg4c10u:1431: yad-aṃśena dhṛtaṃ viśvaṃ sa kṛṣṇo daśame 'rcayet ||
GE07bhg4c10u:1434: vasiṣṭhaś ca mahābhāgaḥ sadṛśā vai svayambhuvā || sapta brahmāṇa ity eṣa purāṇe niścayo
